entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:34 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -22.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -22.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -28.5°C
Wind: W 13 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening then southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
